Package it.polimi.adaptanalyzertool.gui.progress

Class GenericProgressWindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.adaptanalyzertool.gui.NewModalWindowController
      • it.polimi.adaptanalyzertool.gui.progress.GenericProgressWindowController
  • public class GenericProgressWindowController
extends NewModalWindowController

    Controls a window that diplays a progress with a dotted circle nad an ok button that can be enabled with the provided methods.

    The ok button dismiss the window.

      GenericProgressWindowController()

      • okClicked

        public void okClicked()

        Dismisses the window.

      • setProgressMessage

        public void setProgressMessage​(java.lang.String genericProgressMessage)

        Sets a message that will be displayed next to the progres indicator.

        Parameters:
        genericProgressMessage - the message that is diplayed in the window.

      • enableOkButton

        public void enableOkButton()

        Enables the ok button so it can be pressed by the user.

      • setProgressIndicator

        public void setProgressIndicator​(double progress)

        Sets the progress.

        Note that it starts from 0 and a value of 1 means that the process is completed.

        Parameters:
        progress - a number representing the progress ranging from 0 to 1.
